lw_ff_opt_after_reset_default: Reset the options to the default values successfully.
lw_ff_opt_too_close_desc: Distance to auto lower the weapon, lower 0(zero) = OFF
lw_ff_opt_no_custom_wep_desc: Disable the animations for custom weapons.
lw_ff_opt_uppered_wep_distance_desc: Distance to auto upper the weapon when aiming at enemies, 0(zero) = OFF
lw_ff_opt_assault_disable_lowered_desc: When assault is in progress that weapons don't get lowered.
lw_ff_opt_sprinting_disable_lowered_desc: Weapons don't get lowered when sprinting.
